encounter.pirate_ambush.intro: A pirate vessel emerges from the asteroid field, weapons hot. "Heave to and prepare to be boarded," crackles over the comm, "or we'll blast you to atoms!"
encounter.pirate_ambush.fight: Power up weapons and fight back
encounter.pirate_ambush.surrender: Surrender and pay them off (${amount} credits)
encounter.pirate_ambush.negotiate: Try to talk your way out
encounter.pirate_ambush.combat_result: The battle is fierce but brief. Your weapons tear through the pirate's hull, and they break off the attack. You salvage what you can from the wreckage.
encounter.pirate_ambush.escaped: Your pilot pushes the engines to their limit. The pirate vessel falls behind, unable to match your speed. You're clear.
encounter.pirate_ambush.caught: The pirates match your every move. A lucky shot clips your engines, and you're forced to surrender what cargo you have.
encounter.pirate_ambush.surrendered: The pirates take their cut and leave you drifting. It stings, but at least you're alive.
encounter.pirate_ambush.talked_down: Your silver tongue works its magic. The pirate captain laughs and waves you through. "You've got guts, spacer. Get out of here before I change my mind."
encounter.patrol_inspection.intro: A {faction_name} patrol vessel hails you. "Unidentified ship, cut your engines and prepare for routine inspection."
encounter.patrol_inspection.bribe: Offer a 'processing fee' to skip the inspection
encounter.patrol_inspection.inspection: The patrol officers board your ship and conduct a thorough search. They check your cargo manifest, scan for contraband, and verify your credentials.
encounter.patrol_inspection.cleared: "Everything checks out. You're free to go." The patrol vessel peels away and resumes its route.
encounter.patrol_inspection.bribed: The officer pockets the credits with a knowing nod. "Everything looks in order here. Safe travels."
encounter.patrol_inspection.bribe_failed: The officer's face hardens. "Are you trying to bribe a {faction_name} officer?" They call for backup and conduct an even more thorough inspection, plus a fine for attempted bribery.
encounter.patrol_inspection.fled: Your ship's engines roar as you punch it. The patrol vessel gives chase but you lose them in the asteroid field. That was close.
encounter.patrol_inspection.caught_fleei: The patrol vessel is faster than it looks. They disable your engines and board with weapons drawn. The fine for fleeing is steep.
encounter.distress_signal.intro: Your sensors pick up a distress signal from a nearby vessel. The message is garbled, but you can make out: "...engine failure...life support failing...please help..."
encounter.distress_signal.ignore: Ignore the signal and continue on your way
encounter.distress_signal.scan_result: Your sensors reveal the truth: the distress signal is genuine. A small transport is adrift with failing systems. No signs of an ambush.
encounter.distress_signal.approach: As you approach the source of the signal, something feels off. The disabled ship looks too conveniently placed...
encounter.distress_signal.genuine_rescue: The distress call was genuine. You help repair their ship and they reward you generously. "You saved our lives. We won't forget this."
encounter.distress_signal.ambushed: It was a trap! Pirates emerge from hiding and open fire. You take damage before managing to escape.
encounter.distress_signal.avoided_trap: Your caution pays off. As you pull away, you see pirates emerge from hiding. They curse over the open channel as you escape.
encounter.distress_signal.ignored: You continue on your way. The distress signal fades into static behind you.
encounter.trader.intro: A merchant vessel hails you. "{ship_name} here. We've got supplies to trade if you're interested. Fair prices, no questions asked."
encounter.trader.buy_supplies: Buy supplies (30 credits for meds and parts)
encounter.trader.haggle: Try to negotiate a better deal
encounter.trader.decline: No thanks, continue on your way
encounter.trader.traded: The trade is completed smoothly. The merchant waves as they depart. "Pleasure doing business with you!"
encounter.trader.good_deal: The merchant grins. "Alright, alright, you drive a hard bargain. I can do a discount on fuel."
encounter.trader.buy_fuel_discount: Buy discounted fuel (35 credits for 20 fuel)
encounter.trader.offended: The merchant's expression sours. "I don't have time for this. Good day." They cut the connection.
encounter.trader.declined: "Your loss, friend. Safe travels." The merchant vessel moves on.
encounter.smuggler.intro: A nondescript freighter matches your course. A gruff voice comes over a private channel: "Hey, spacer. I've got a proposition for you. Easy money, no questions. Interested?"
encounter.smuggler.accepted: "Smart choice." The smuggler transfers the credits. "Just forget you ever saw me." The freighter peels away and vanishes into the void.
encounter.smuggler.declined: "Suit yourself." The channel goes dead and the freighter changes course, disappearing into the black.
encounter.smuggler.intimidated: The smuggler's eyes widen. "Okay, okay! Here, take this and forget we ever met!" They transfer some credits and flee.
encounter.smuggler.hostile: "Big mistake, friend." The smuggler's ship opens fire before fleeing. You take some damage before they disappear.
encounter.derelict.intro: Your sensors detect a derelict vessel drifting nearby. It appears abandoned, but there might be salvage worth claiming.
encounter.derelict.scan_complete: Scans reveal the ship is safe to board. Life support is offline but the hull is intact. Sensors detect valuable salvage in the cargo hold.
encounter.derelict.boarding: You dock with the derelict and begin exploring. The ship is dark and silent, but your lights reveal...
encounter.derelict.good_salvage: ...a cargo hold full of valuable goods! The previous crew must have abandoned ship in a hurry.
encounter.derelict.hazard: ...a ruptured fuel line! You grab what you can before the situation becomes dangerous.
encounter.derelict.safe_salvage: The salvage operation goes smoothly. You recover valuable cargo and spare parts, plus some interesting data from the ship's computers.
encounter.derelict.salvaged: You secure the salvage and return to your ship. Not a bad haul.
encounter.derelict.accident: A minor accident during salvage operations. You got some goods, but it could have gone better.
encounter.derelict.ignored: You leave the derelict behind. Someone else's problem now.
encounter.faction_agent.intro: A sleek vessel intercepts your course. The pilot identifies themselves as an agent of {faction_name}. "I have a business proposition for you, Captain."
encounter.faction_agent.proposal: "We need someone to deliver a package. No questions about contents, no records. Standard courier rates, plus a bonus for discretion."
encounter.faction_agent.accepted: "Excellent. The package will be delivered to your hold. You'll receive the rest of the payment on delivery." The agent's ship peels away.
encounter.faction_agent.declined: "A pity. Perhaps another time." The agent's ship changes course and disappears.
encounter.faction_agent.refused: You cut the channel without responding. The agent's ship lingers for a moment, then moves on.
encounter.mysterious_signal.intro: Your sensors detect an unusual signal emanating from a nearby asteroid. It doesn't match any known frequency patterns.
encounter.mysterious_signal.investigatio: You approach the asteroid and find a hidden cache. Someone went to great lengths to conceal this...
encounter.mysterious_signal.nothing: It's just old equipment - not worth the time
encounter.mysterious_signal.decoded: Your tech expert cracks the signal. It's coordinates to a hidden cache! You find valuable salvage and encrypted data worth a fortune.
encounter.mysterious_signal.found_someth: The cache contains valuable equipment and credits. Whoever hid this isn't coming back for it.
encounter.mysterious_signal.dead_end: After hours of searching, you find nothing of value. Time wasted.
encounter.mysterious_signal.ignored: You log the signal's location and continue on your way. Maybe another time.
encounter.mechanical_failure.intro: Warning klaxons blare as your ship shudders. A critical system has failed and needs immediate attention.
encounter.mechanical_failure.use_parts: Use spare parts for a guaranteed fix
encounter.mechanical_failure.repaired: Your engineer works their magic. The system is back online and running better than before.
encounter.mechanical_failure.partial_rep: The repair doesn't quite hold. You'll need proper maintenance at a station, and the delay costs you time.
encounter.mechanical_failure.jury_rigged: The temporary fix holds, but it's not pretty. The ship will need proper repairs at the next station.
encounter.mechanical_failure.fixed_with_: The spare parts do the trick. The system is back to full functionality.
encounter.refugee_plea.intro: A small, battered vessel hails you. "Please, we need help. We're refugees fleeing the conflict. Our supplies are nearly gone."
encounter.refugee_plea.offer_passage: Offer them passage to the next station
encounter.refugee_plea.helped: The refugees are grateful beyond words. "Thank you, Captain. You've given us hope." They share what little information they have about the sector.
encounter.refugee_plea.passengers: The refugees board your ship. They're quiet and stay out of the way. At the next station, they pay you what they can and disappear into the crowd.
encounter.refugee_plea.declined: The refugees' faces fall as you break off contact. You continue on your way.
encounter.refugee_plea.truth_revealed: Your questions reveal they're not quite what they seem - they're actually deserters from a mercenary company, fleeing with stolen data.
encounter.test.intro: This is a test encounter for development purposes.
encounter.test.result_a: You chose option A. The encounter ends.
encounter.test.result_b_success: Your skill check succeeded! Great job.
encounter.test.result_b_failure: Your skill check failed. Better luck next time.
